results.name: Sequence R(n) arising from analysis of structure of A046702.
reference: Callaghan, Joseph, John J. Chew III, and Stephen M. Tanny. "On the behavior of a family of meta-Fibonacci sequences." SIAM Journal on Discrete Mathematics 18.4 (2005): 794-824. See Eq. (3.1) and Table 3.1.
